featureImage0: Boilr is an Android app which monitors Bitcoin, cryptocurrencies and bullion prices, and triggers alarms according to user settings.
featureImage1:
Price Hit

Triggered when price crosses the alarm's upper or lower limit.
featureImage2:
Price Change

Triggered when price changes more than X amount (in currency or percentage) in a specified time frame (e.g. 15 min). It uses a rolling time frame: price is fetched with a given update interval (e.g. 30 s) and compared with the price fetched one time frame ago (e.g. 15 min ago).
featureImage3: Price Hit alarm triggering for a lower limit of 273.86 USD.
featureImage4: Sound and vibration are configurable globally and individually for each alarm.
featureImage6: Reorder alarms after a long click.
featureImage7: Lists of exchanges, pairs and alarms are fully searchable, allowing a quick alarm setup and configuration.
featureImage8: Market data is retrieved directly from the exchanges using Wi-Fi or Mobile Data (if allowed). Boilr supports all exchanges available on libdynticker, and all their pairs.
featureImage9: Supports multiple languages, including english, chinese and german.
featureImage10: It also has an alternative white theme.
